text: Arau te'omra sampradaya te'omra lagata bitarkata lipta ha’la. Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke mora lagata allaha samparke bitarkata lipta haicha? Athaca teraemi moka hidayata diche. Tomaloke te'omra lagata yaka ansidara sthapana karai acha ma'i taka bhaya nakarao kintu mora pratipalake yadi kiba karae (seya sukiya katha). Mora pratipalake jnanara dbaraa sakalo bastu paraibyapta karai ache. Tathapi'o tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraibane’
